amendment.description: Amendment provides for the use of $1 million to direct the U.S. Border Patrol and security personnel to eradicate spotter and lookout locations of drug smugglers in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase by transfer for the U.S. Customs and Border Protection by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
